_description: Alternating French and English couplets, with English devolving into prose early in work, though occasional couplets in English throughout — in couplets

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Beau enfant pour apprendreEn franceis deueȝ bien
                        entendreffayre chyld for to lerneIn frensh ȝe schal wel
                    vnder stande…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Now prayeþ god so ȝe may endÞat to hys Ioye
                    ȝe may kome so be hyt
CamTCC323.Attributed Title:
Liber iste vocatur femina quia sicut femina docet infantem loqui
                        maternam sic docet iste liber iuuenes rehtorice loqui gallicum prout infra
                        patebit (f. 88); Capitulum primum docet rethorice loqui de
                        assimilitudine bestiarum (f. 88)
